device.reset: You are about to reset this device, which will erase all data including keys, profiles, and personal files

init.greeting_subheader: Your device will be configured by the setup wizard
init.no_profile_option: Your profile will be created without a name. You can change this later in Settings > Profile
init.on_complete: Success. Your device was configured. To view or change your configuration go to Settings > Profile

profile.handle_back_with_selected_photo: Do you want to use this photo or keep your existing one?
profile.handle_back_with_selected_photo_no_exist: Do you want to use this photo or leave the page?
profile.update_name_confirmation: Updating your username will result in public links on your profile being updated
